item.title: JavaScript TDD with Jasmine and Karma
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: We do rapid releases at AWeber so we’re constantly pushing code changes to our users. To be sure that we aren’t in a constant state of “fix 1 bug, introduce 2 more” we embrace TDD across our entire stack. This includes making sure our front-end JavaScript code has thorough test coverage.
